titleInfo.title: Sketch of survey lots in the City of Hamilton, the property of Robert N. Law, Esqr.

physicalDescription.note: 1 map : col. ; 50 x 39 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso. There are a number of creases and tears running from the top to the bottom of the map. The bottom right hand corner has a portion missing, appears as though it was cut out.

mods.note: "Scale 100 Feet to the Inch." The map is numbered, on the left edge it reads "No 29 Drawer 6" in handwriting. The top right hand corner features a hand-drawn box with a penciled sketch. There is an inelligible note written in pencil above Roswell Street regarding the lots below. The signature reads "R.N. Law". The streets listed include Queen Street North, Robert Street, Douglas Street, and Roswell Street. Only Queen Street is in existence, in place, today.
